Property.name: ClassicRingPan
Property.HelpText: Alternate between 100% left and right panning like in the DC version and classic games.

Property.name: ReplaceChaoSounds
Property.HelpText: Replace SADX Chao sound effects with matching or similar sounds from SA1 Dreamcast.

Property.name: EnableChaoBGSounds
Property.HelpText: Restore unused background noises in Chao gardens.

Property.name: BoaBoaFix
Property.HelpText: Play some effects multiple times (like in SA1) instead of once.

Property.name: SpindashFade
Property.HelpText: Fade out some sounds instead of cutting them off.

Property.name: DelayedSounds
Property.HelpText: Simulate a reverb effect by delaying playback of multiple identical sounds. When disabled, multiple sounds will play as a single loud sound.

Property.name: MusicVolumeBoost
Property.HelpText: Boost music volume (0 to 65535). Maximum volume without boost is -1100.

Property.name: VoiceVolumeBoost
Property.HelpText: Boost voice volume (0 to 65535). Maximum volume without boost is -300.
